Pre-Game Insights: Western Conference foes Phoenix and Portland face off on Saturday.
Phoenix finished 49-33 overall, 29-23 in Western Conference play and 24-16 at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Suns shot 49.3% from the field and 38.2% from 3-point range last season.
Portland went 21-61 overall and 8-44 in Western Conference action during the 2023-24 season.
The Trail Blazers gave up 115.4 points per game while committing 20.2 fouls last season.
Suns injuries: Josh Okogie (day to day, hamstring), Bradley Beal (day to day, elbow).
Trail Blazers injuries: Matisse Thybulle (out, knee), Robert Williams III (out, hamstring), Shaedon Sharpe (out, shoulder).
